name: AMTEC Thermoelectric
imageDescription: Cutaway diagram of AMTEC generator showing nuclear reactor, radiation shield, heat pipes, and 75 MWth radiator panel with astronaut for scale.

name: JTEC H2 Thermoelectric
imageDescription: Schematic of hydrogen thermoelectric system showing PCM modules, membrane electrode assemblies, heat exchanger, and 40 MWth radiator.

name: Brayton Turbine
imageDescription: Technical diagram of closed Brayton cycle showing compressor, generator, quasi-turbine, reactor, recuperator, coolant flow, and 300 MWth radiator.

name: O'Meara LSP Paralens
imageDescription: Diagram of laser-sustained plasma lens system with supersonic nozzle, concentric Fresnel rings, and remote laser-beam powerplant satellite.

name: Cascade Photovoltaic
imageDescription: Cross-section of cascade photovoltaic fiber showing Al, LiF, active layer, PEDOT, ITO layers around 50 um diameter optical fiber receiving light.

name: Buckyball C60 Photovoltaic
imageDescription: Layered diagram of fullerene photovoltaic cell showing ITO, CuPC, C60, BCP, Ag, and Rubrene antenna layers with light path indicated.

name: Cascade Thermoacoustic
imageDescription: Detailed schematic of thermoacoustic engine showing traveling wave stages, regenerators, bellows, flow straighteners, heat exchangers, and standing wave stage.

name: Dusty Plasma MHD
imageDescription: Cutaway of dusty plasma MHD generator showing 242m Am dust plasma, electron separation electrodes, RF induction coil, LiH moderator, and deceleration electrodes.

name: Catalyzed Fission Scintillator
imageDescription: Cross-section of scintillator showing 450nm scintillator layer, uranium coating, CdWO4 high-temperature photovoltaic cell, and coupling to 140 MWth radiator.

name: Diamonoid Electrodynamic Tether
imageDescription: Orbital view of electrodynamic tether system with satellites at each end, deployed against Earth's atmosphere and magnetic field.

name: Ericsson Engine
imageDescription: Technical diagram of Ericsson engine showing supply cylinder, tank, piston, regenerator, power cylinder, and 140 MWth radiator.

name: Nanocomposite Thermoelectric
imageDescription: Exploded view of nanocomposite thermoelectric module showing substrate, p-type and n-type thermoelectric elements, metal interconnects, and 8 MWth radiator.

name: Flywheel Compulsator
imageDescription: Cutaway of flywheel compulsator showing containment, stationary shell, electronics, motor/generator, and magnetic suspension system.

name: Superconducting Adductor
imageDescription: Cross-section of superconducting magnetic energy storage device showing radiation heat shield, current lead port, and coolant port.

name: H2-O2 Fuel Cell
imageDescription: Diagram of PEM fuel cell with anode, electrolyte, cathode showing H2 and O2 reactions, plus hydrogen-producing cyanobacteria vats receiving solar radiation.

name: Microbial Fuel Cell
imageDescription: Cross-section of microbial fuel cell showing crop plant, sediment with bacterium, PEM membrane, cathode, anode, and glucose/NAD cycle.

name: In-core Thermionic
imageDescription: Cutaway of in-core thermionic generator showing reactor, neutron shield, power conversion & control, 355 MWth radiator, main pump, and transmission line.

name: Z-pinch Microfission
imageDescription: Schematic of Z-pinch microfission system showing pulsed power storage, magnetic nozzle, sacrificial LMTL ribbon, pick up loops, and 335 GJ Cm bomb.

name: Magnetoshell Plasma Parachute
imageDescription: Diagram of magnetoshell plasma parachute showing 50m tether, AC current, dynamic plasma field, RMF driven currents, and interplanetary neutral atoms.

name: Granular Rainbow Corral
imageDescription: Visualization of granular rainbow corral showing adaptive optics clouds, Shack-Hartman sensor, fast steering mirrors, push-broom optical corral, and coded aperture.

name: Marx Capacitor Bank
imageDescription: 3D rendering of Marx capacitor bank showing transmission line, rimfire switch, intermediate storage, and marx capacitor bank arrays.

name: Casimir Battery
imageDescription: Stack of aluminum spirals 1-2 atoms thick showing electrostatic repulsion, Casimir attraction, and relativistic van der Waals force interactions.

name: Optoelectric Nuclear Battery
imageDescription: Diagram of optoelectric nuclear battery with shadow shield, conjugate mirror, diamond crystal photovoltaics, window, reflective mirror, and high pressure beta-emitter.

name: Nuclear-pumped Excimer Flashlamp
imageDescription: Cross-section of nuclear-pumped excimer flashlamp showing fiberoptic waveguides, usphere fissile fuel, photon reflector, aerosol nuclear fuel, and neutron reflector.

name: Photon Tether Rectenna
imageDescription: Diagram of photon tether rectenna showing HR mirrors in formation, 10 km rectenna mesh, 4mm kevlar tether, intracavity CW laser beam, and photon thruster.

name: Palmer LSP Aerosol Lens
imageDescription: Illustration of Palmer LSP aerosol lens showing laser beam, spatial light modulator, mirror, Fresnel interference pattern, and pseudo-holographic glass bead lens field.

name: Radioisotope Stirling
imageDescription: Rendering of radioisotope Stirling generator showing 238Pu bricks, fins, pressure relief, shunt, insulation, alternator, stirling convertor, and DC output controller.

name: Triggered Decay Nuclear Battery
imageDescription: Diagram of triggered decay nuclear battery showing metastable 177m Lu, X-ray trigger, gamma-rays, n-layer, p-layer, e-h pairs, and Fermi potential DC output.

name: Rankine MHD
imageDescription: Schematic of Rankine MHD system showing vapor fuel, BeO reflector, gas core reactor, magnet coils, MHD direct-conversion generator, and condenser.

name: MHD Open-Cycle
imageDescription: Diagram of open-cycle MHD showing hot plasma input, B-field, plasma output exhausted, voltage ladder, voltage multiplier, deceleration & collection electrodes.

name: Rankine Solar Dynamic
imageDescription: Technical diagram of binary Rankine cycle showing 80 MWth radiator, compressor, generator, recuperator, toluene cycle, quasi-turbine, evaporator, Hg cycle, and Mo piping.

name: Rankine Multiphase
imageDescription: Diagram of Rankine multiphase system showing electromagnetic vortices, plasma, optical fibers, battery bank, 3-phase transformers, 600K radiators, and multistage collectors.

name: Solar Stirling
imageDescription: Rendering of solar Stirling engine showing displacer, regenerator, 140 MWth radiator, piston, and heat input.

name: Thermo-Photovoltaic
imageDescription: Layered diagram showing photovoltaic layers (GaSb, InGaAsSb) on top and thermoelectric layers (SiGe, PbTe, Bi2Te3) below, with 48 MWth radiator.
